item.title: Understanding HTML and CSS
item.dc:creator: jenny
item.content:encoded:
Educavo Course Details

"On the other hand, we denounce with righteous indignation and dislike men who are so beguiled and demoralized by the charms of pleasure of the moment, so blinded by desire, that they cannot foresee the pain and trouble that are bound to ensue; and equal blame belongs to those who fail in their duty through weakness of will, which is the same as saying through shrinking from toil and pain. These cases are perfectly simple and easy to distinguish. In a free hour, when our power of choice is untrammelled and when nothing prevents our being able to do what we like best, every pleasure is to be welcomed and every pain avoided. But in certain circumstances and owing to the claims of duty or the obligations of business it will frequently occur that pleasures have to be repudiated and annoyances accepted. The wise man therefore always holds in these matters to this principle of selection: he rejects pleasures to secure other greater pleasures, or else he endures pains to avoid worse pains."

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: I really enjoyed this course. It's great that you can do bits as and when you have time and that you can go over things again if you need to. It was well structured so I didn't get overwhelmed with information. There were lots of useful tips that left me feeling confident to explore yoga further. Whenever I had a question, I received a detailed answer very quickly.

wp:commentmeta.wp:meta_value: Excellent course for those who want toâ€¦

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: Good course and easily to understand.

These cases are perfectly simple and easy to distinguish. In a free hour, when our power of choice is untrammelled and when nothing prevents our being able to do what we like best, every pleasure is to be welcomed and every pain avoided. But in certain circumstances and owing to the claims of duty or the obligations of business it will frequently occur that pleasures have to be repudiated and annoyances accepted. item.title: Music Theory Comprehensive Complete!
item.dc:creator: jenny
item.content:encoded:
Educavo Course Details

For years I've been teaching Music Theory in the college classroom. These classes I'm making for Udemy use the same syllabus I've used in my college classes for years, at a fraction of the cost. I believe anyone can learn Music Theory - and cost shouldn't be a barrier. For years I've been teaching Music Theory in the college classroom. These classes I'm making for Udemy use the same syllabus I've used in my college classes for years, at a fraction of the cost. I believe anyone can learn Music Theory - and cost shouldn't be a barrier.

What youâ€™ll learn?

  • Read Music Using Proven Techniques
  • Read, Play, and Count Rhythms Accurately
  • Understand All the Symbols (Not Only the Notes) of a Music Score
  • PhThe elements of the Score.
  • Pitch Names
  • Half-Steps and Whole-Steps.
  • Identifying Notes on the Staff
  • Beat and Beat Divisions

Requirements

  • Students should be enthusiastic about music, but do not need to be producers or musicians. No prior experience is needed in music - All are welcome!
  • I'll be using a piece of software in this course that I would like students to get. Don't worry - it's free! And works on Mac and PC programs. I'll tell you more in the first few videos.

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: A good repetition of things I learned long ago. Very refreshing.
Teachers were outstanding. Lectures are to the point without drag-on. Many thanks for the quality of your efforts!

item.title: The professional balancing of ice cream recipes
item.dc:creator: jenny
item.content:encoded:
Description

Have you ever wonder based on what a professional ice cream formula is written? Why certain ingredients are chosen and why in such a specific ratio? Why the ice cream we buy stays soft after days in the freezer? This is the occasion to give an answer to those questions! The class is meant for ice cream maker and pastry chefs, but any passionate hobbyist is the most welcome! Throughout the course we will talk about ice cream ingredients, their functions, in order to understand how to build a complete recipe from zero. Please bear in mind that this course is not to teach how to make ice cream, but rather very important and technical aspects behind the recipe architecture.

What youâ€™ll learn?

  • How to read, interpretate, modify and write an artisanal ice-cream recipe
  • Which re the technical functions of te ice-cream ingredients

Requirements

  • To have a general knowledge of ice cream making

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: There are some new things that i learned from this course, that i haven't found or read in the book before. so it's good to have new knowledge. it's easy to understand
It was a fantastic course with lots of hands on training and fun! Absolutely recommended to all food lovers !
